meanings: (맞서 이겨 내다) match, (어려운 상황 등을) cope with

meanings.meaning: how to behave with a burglar

vlive.korean: [Q. 애인에게 배신 당했을 때 나를 위로해줄 소울 푸드가 있다면?] [Q. What food would comfort you if your lover betrayed you?] View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 이 비주얼 이제 못 본다는 사실 컨펌 못 해... [엑스엑스(XX)] - 비하인드
vlive.english: [Q. What food would comfort you if your lover betrayed you?]

vlive.korean: "죄수복입고 납치 당했을때 기분이 어땠어요?" what do you feel when you were kidnapped suddenly dressed like a prisoner?" 듣기 View video tvN : tvN '신서유기 외전-꽃보다 청춘 위너' LIVE TALK (Here Comes Trouble: Unplanned Trip LIVE TALK)
vlive.english: what do you feel when you were kidnapped suddenly dressed like a prisoner?"

vlive.korean: [사투리 소개] 특히 프로주서님들께 많이 PICK 당했을 것 같은 술. [Dialect introduction] This would have been picked by many Busan drinkers. 듣기 View video 스튜디오 룰루랄라 (Studio LuluLala) : [취중막말] ep.4 술부심 폭발한 프로酒스18 잔뜩 젖은 김동한 인성논란
vlive.english: [Dialect introduction] This would have been picked by many Busan drinkers.

vlive.korean: 그런데 거부를 당했을 때는 어쩔 수 없이 알아서 빙수를 2,000원에 사오셔야 합니다. But if you're turned down, you must buy shaved ice for ￦2,000 no matter what. 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : LABOUM - LABOUM TeleVision 라붐 '라붐이들을 크게 불러줘~!'
vlive.english: But if you're turned down, you must buy shaved ice for ￦2,000 no matter what.

vlive.korean: 마피아에 의해 아웃 당했습니다 - 진짜? He was out by the mafia. - Really? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [SF9] 농부 그룹 셒구의 밤에 오신 걸 환영합니다🌾 (SF9 playing the Mafia game)
vlive.english: He was out by the mafia. - Really?

examples.korean: He went bail for her when she was sued. 발음듣기 그녀가 고소를 당했을 때, 그는 보석 증인이 되었다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He went bail for her when she was sued. 발음

examples.korean: You probably got compared to David again. 발음듣기 넌 또 데이비드하고 비교 당했을 거야. Neungyule
examples.english: You probably got compared to David again. 발음

examples.korean: Her family had a difficult escape when the Japanese were forced out of the country at the end of the war. 발음듣기 그녀의 가족은 일본이 전쟁 말에 나라를 떠나도록 강요 당했을 때 힘든 도피를 했다. Neungyule
examples.english: Her family had a difficult escape when the Japanese were forced out of the country at the end of the war. 발음

examples.korean: It was not only rejected by publishers in the Soviet Union, but also censored like many of his other manuscripts. 발음듣기 이 작품은 구소련에서 출판업자들에게 거절 당했을 뿐만 아니라 그의 수많은 다른 원고들처럼 검열을 받았다. Neungyule
examples.english: It was not only rejected by publishers in the Soviet Union, but also censored like many of his other manuscripts. 발음

examples.korean: If Danny did not catch the ball, the Red Sox would have had three outs. 발음듣기 대니가 공을 잡지 않았다면 레드삭스는 3아웃을 당했을 것이다. Neungyule
examples.english: If Danny did not catch the ball, the Red Sox would have had three outs. 발음
